Function Documentation

◆ create_batch()

std::unique_ptr<Batch> claragenomics::cudapoa::create_batch ( int32_t  max_sequences_per_poa,
int32_t  device_id,
cudaStream_t  stream,
size_t  max_mem,
int8_t  output_mask,
int16_t  gap_score,
int16_t  mismatch_score,
int16_t  match_score,
bool  cuda_banded_alignment 
)

Creates a new CUDA Batch object.

Parameters
max_sequences_per_poaMaximum number of sequences per POA
device_idGPU device on which to run CUDA POA algorithm
streamCUDA stream to use on GPU
max_memMaximum GPU memory to use for this batch.
output_maskWhich outputs to produce from POA (msa, consensus)
gap_scoreScore to be assigned to a gap
mismatch_scoreScore to be assigned to a mismatch
match_scoreScore to be assigned for a match
cuda_banded_alignmentWhether to use banded alignment
Returns
Returns a unique pointer to a new Batch object
